sense.name: an individual who sells goods
sense.examples: The coin dealer took his wares to trade shows. Bob said that man is not a reputable dealer of antiques, some of his stock is stolen goods. The drug addicts met their dealer in an abandoned apartment building.

sense.name: a trading firm
sense.examples: I get a good discount at my local tire dealers. Their family firm has been a dealer in Oriental rugs for three generations. That company is a reliable appliance dealer.

sense.name: financial principal or professional in stock trades
sense.examples: On black Monday the market makers and dealers took huge financial hits. Nasdaq is an association of stock dealers. The dealer paid a million dollars for a seat on that stock exchange.

sense.name: someone who distributes cards in a card game
sense.examples: John will be the dealer on the next hand. I asked the Blackjack dealer to hit me again. The pit boss told the dealer to keep reshuffling the deck.
